name: Be Careful What You Eat
description:
Hi, this is my second game jam game! I'm 13 and I worked really hard with my 10 year old brother BoTzO https://itch.io/profile/botzo (he did the art, I did everything else) to make Be Careful What You Eat! Its a 1 minute high score style game where you try win a morbid eating competition where you have to work with your robotic partner to tell which apples and batteries are poison, and which are safe.

"I really hope you enjoy, it was a pain getting that AI working!" - Dev

"Eat carefully." - Artist
